casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

January 9, 2007

[Cite as 01/09/2007 Case Announcements, 2007-Ohio-37.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2003-1572. State ex rel. Howard v. Indus. Comm.

Franklin App. No. 97AP-860. This cause came on for further consideration upon appellant’s motion for leave to file a complaint for a writ of mandamus. Upon consideration thereof,

It is ordered by the court that the motion for leave is denied.
